channel.title: Forum Micro Mafia - Russian Roulette 9/8 - Town Wins!
channel.description:
#
[color=orange] Forum Mafia - Russian Roulette :gun: [/color]
Hosted by Marluxipan
# [color=orange] Gameplay [/color] :video_game: The game is nightless. There is no voting There is no lynching When the number of mafia = the number of remaining town, mafia win. The mafia share a day chat. ## [color=orange]Roulette Mechanics[/color] At any point, a player may fire at another player with **/shoot**. The first shot fired has a 1/6th chance to hit. The second shot fired has a 1/5th chance to hit. The third, 1/4th, and so on until the chance is 100%. After a player is killed, the chance resets to 1/6th. Once you have shot, you cannot shoot again until all other players have shot. # [color=orange] Rolecards [/color] :flower_playing_cards: > # [color=green]Vanilla Town[/color] > You are a member of the town. You're wonderful! *Your goal is to see all of the mafia dead.* > # [color=red]Mafia Goon[/color] > You are a member of the mafia! Your fellow mafia member is (PlayerName.) *Your goal is to outnumber the members of the town.* # [color=orange] Rolelist[/color] :scroll: [color=red]**2x Mafia Goon**[/color] [color=green]**7x Vanilla Town**[/color] # [color=orange] Player List [/color] 1. @Pug - [color=green]**Town**[/color] 2. @Moleland 3. @MtheJoker 4. @Memesky - [color=green]**Town**[/color] 5. @Kirefitten - [color=green]**Town**[/color] 6. @Hippolytus - [color=green]**Town**[/color] 7. @MaximusPrime - - [color=green]**Town**[/color] 8. @Htm 9. @Margaret - - [color=red]**Mafia**[/color] Spectators: Boss110
